name: SpringHill Suites Dallas Addison/Quorum Drive

reviews.text: Great hotel, great breakfast, with eggs, sausage and the works. Location is right on restaurant row so there are dozens of your favorite restaurants within blocks. Also within a mile or 2 from galleria shopping. The room was kind of small for a suite, no door dividing 2 rooms just a half wall and a TV that tilted toward the bed or fold out couch. With 3 adults and 1 infant, it was a little crammed, also not a ton of privacy from person on foldout couch. Otherwise a nice hotel. Great location, .5 miles from Addison airport.
reviews.title: great hotel/location, small room
THE BEST!
reviews.text: This was the best hotel experience I have ever had. The staff was very helpful in all questions asked, the room was clean and very comfortable, with lots of room. Also had a nice breakfast area. There are so many restaurants to choose from in this area, close to lots of shopping. Overall just a great experience with no problems.

Newer hotel with modern furnishings. Clean room with good bedding. I liked the open floor plan of the suites. Made it feel spacious. Comfortable desk chair with easy to use, reliable, internet connection.
reviews.title: Good Choice

reviews.text: Above average complimentary breakfast buffet. Lobby offers complimentary USA Today, Dallas Morning News, and WSJ!
reviews.title: Great hotel

aka: Springhill Suites Dallas Addison/Quorum Drive Hotel Addison
